title: League Patcher
body: I have an extremely fast internet here at my university and I had no classes today. Im connected via Ethernet. I tried to download league and this is what happened. I sped through the download in minutes then it took me literally 4 hours to get from 33 % applying patches to 64 % applying patches. Now it's been on 64% applying patches for another hour. I have to go home soon. What a waste. Really ridiculous how long this takes.

replies.body:
The last 66% of patching really relies on a great connection to the patching service. While your network connection at your university may be fast to a lot of sites, it may not have the most optimal connection to our patching servers. If you still have patching issues on your University Network, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it touches on the most common solutions.

Let me know if your issue persists.
